name: Demigod: Epic Adventures In The Greek Mythos
name_original: Demigod: Epic Adventures In The Greek Mythos
description: The men, women and monsters of Greek mythology have shaped much of the storytelling of the modern world. Demigod gives you a chance to tell your own stories in the world of Greek mythology. Pit heroes of your own creation against legendary monsters. Find loot, earn experience, and turn your band of heroes into full-fledged gods.
